#!/usr/bin/env bash

# Read JSON from stdin
read -r input

# Extract data (available: model, workspace.path, session.totalTokens, session.estimatedCost)
model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model // "unknown"')
dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.path // "~"' | sed "s|$HOME|~|")

# Output formatted statusline
echo "$model | $dir"
